verses.verse: A Song, a Psalm of the sons of Korah; for the Chief Musician; set to Mahalath Leannoth. Maschil of Heman the Ezrahite. O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>, I have <S%H6817>cried<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and night before <S%H3915>thee<s%>.
Let my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into thy <S%H6440>presence<s%>; <S%H5186>Incline<s%> thine <S%H241>ear<s%> unto my <S%H7440>cry<s%>.
For my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H7451>troubles<s%>, And my <S%H2416>life<s%> draweth <S%H5060>nigh<s%> unto <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>.
I am <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> with them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>; I am as a <S%H1397>man<s%> that hath no <S%H353>help<s%>,

Cast <S%H2670><s%> off among the <S%H4191>dead<s%>, Like the <S%H2491>slain<s%> that <S%H7901>lie<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave<s%>, Whom thou <S%H2142>rememberest<s%> no <S%H1504>more<s%>, And they are cut off from thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
Thou hast <S%H7896>laid<s%> me in the <S%H8482>lowest<s%> <S%H953>pit<s%>, In <S%H4285>dark<s%> <S%H4688>places<s%>, in the deeps.
Thy <S%H2534>wrath<s%> lieth <S%H5564>hard<s%> upon <S%H6031>me<s%>, And thou hast afflicted me with all thy <S%H4867>waves<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

Thou hast <S%H7368>put<s%> mine <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H7896>me<s%>; Thou hast made me an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto <S%H3607>them<s%>: I am shut up, and I cannot come <S%H3318>forth<s%>.

Mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H1669>wasteth<s%> away by reason of <S%H6040>affliction<s%>: I have <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H3117>daily<s%> upon <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah; I have spread <S%H7849>forth<s%> my hands unto <S%H3709>thee<s%>.
Wilt thou <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H6382>wonders<s%> to the <S%H4191>dead<s%>? Shall they that are <S%H7496>deceased<s%> <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H5542>thee<s%>? Selah
Shall thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> be <S%H5608>declared<s%> in the <S%H6913>grave<s%>? Or thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> in <S%H11>Destruction<s%>?
Shall thy <S%H6382>wonders<s%> be <S%H3045>known<s%> in the <S%H2822>dark<s%>? And thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5388>forgetfulness<s%>?
But unto <S%H3068>thee<s%>, O Jehovah, have I <S%H7768>cried<s%>; And in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> shall my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> come before <S%H6923>thee<s%>.
Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, why castest thou <S%H2186>off<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>? Why <S%H5641>hidest<s%> thou thy face from <S%H6440>me<s%>?
I am <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and ready to <S%H1478>die<s%> from my <S%H5290>youth<s%> <S%H5375>up<s%>: While I suffer thy <S%H367>terrors<s%> I am <S%H6323>distracted<s%>.
Thy fierce <S%H2740>wrath<s%> is gone <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H1161>me<s%>; Thy terrors have cut me <S%H6789>off<s%>.
They came round <S%H5437>about<s%> me like <S%H4325>water<s%> all the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5362>long<s%>; They compassed me about <S%H3162>together<s%>.
Lover <S%H157><s%> and <S%H7453>friend<s%> hast thou put <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H3045>me<s%>, And mine acquaintance into <S%H4285>darkness<s%>.
